value.title: Create Organizational Change Through Inclusive Leadership
value.excerpt: Organizational culture can seem like an abstract concept, but we all have an impact on the organizations we work in. Ritu Bhasin explains how leaders can effect change through inclusive and authentic leadership.  - - - - -   bhasin consulting inc. (bci) is a world-renowned full-service diversity, equity

value.title: The Importance of Authenticity in the Workplace
value.excerpt: The key ingredient for building an inclusive environment is authenticity. Here Ritu Bhasin discusses the importance of authenticity for inclusion in the workplace and her reasons for developing the Three Selves Model, a tool for leaders to use when engaging in inclusive coaching.  - - - - -   bhasin

value.title: How the "Work-Life Balance" Blindspot Impacts Women Professionals
value.excerpt: Many organizations today have learned how to attract and hire top women candidates â€” but these same organizations often struggle with retention.
